name: Medieval Machines
description:
The Adventure Begins!

Explore the skies in this exciting side scrolling shooter! Set a medieval world with gears and pistons, the art of this game is inspired by the amazing novel series: Mortal Engines. You play as a skilled aviator to defeat as many enemies as possible as you carefully navigate the dangerous skies. Have fun with this small but addictive game! 

Tips on getting a high score: Pay attention to your aiming! The more combos, the more bonus points you'll get!
